title: ‘Carpool Karaoke: The Series’ season 5 coming this month to Apple TV+ [Video]
content:
Apple last year renewed “Carpool Karaoke: The Series” for a fifth season. The show was created before Apple even launched Apple TV+, so it was distributed through Apple Music. Now the fifth season is finally coming this month, this time on Apple TV+.

more…

The post ‘Carpool Karaoke: The Series’ season 5 coming this month to Apple TV+ [Video] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple renewed "Carpool Karaoke: The Series" for a fifth season. The new season premieres this month on Apple TV+.
